name: Watermelon Hit Target
description:
Watermelon Hit Target is the only first person shooting game that includes all new features of modern fruit shooting adventure games. You can slice the water melon fruits without obstacle such as bombs and shells.
Features:
.Real watermelon shooting game
.Realistic broken and smashing sounds
.Real broken blast with 3D animations
.Aim and smash fruits
.Arcade and time attack mode
.Addictive FPS game
.Simple and intuitive action control
